data.title: Move more shroud logic to RevealsShroud / GeneratesShroud
data.body:
This moves the last of the actor-specific visibility code from `Shroud` on to the actors themselves.  It is an ugly set of changes with no visible in-game effects, but sets the scene for future PRs that will introduce new features.  Depends on #8474, #8477.
- `Shroud` is now (if we ignore the fragile alliances workaround) focused on a much narrower scope of shroud queries.  Logic related to working out the shroud revealing/generation area now lives in `RevealsShroud`/`GeneratesShroud` and logic related to determining actor visibility is in `IDefaultVisibility` implementations (from #8477).
- This prepares for (but stops short of) splitting `GetVisOrigins` into separate logic for "cells I reveal from" and "cells that reveal me" (needed for heightmap shroud and faithful D2K shroud revealing).
- This prepares for (but stops short of) adding support for non-actor and non-circular shroud reveal sources (#5061, #7916, etc)
- This takes us yet another step towards heightmap-aware shroud.

data.title: Implements a disguise decoration to Spies.
data.body:
Deprecates WithDecorationDisguised in favor of a refactor in Disguise.
![spypip](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1136302/8145758/b20944b0-1215-11e5-8718-05b15126b2bf.PNG)
Opened eye when disguised (animated, thanks @x-a-n-a-x ), closed eye when undisguised.

Implements #7466.

data.title: Move actor visibility checks out of Shroud
data.body:
This moves the responsibility of checking actor visibility from Shroud on to the actor itself.  This is another small step towards heightmapped shroud support.

The new-found configurability is used to hide your own delivery aircraft under the fog in TD and D2K: these actors do not reveal any shroud, and having them visible is inconsistent with the idea that the fogged regions of the map are "blind" to you -- you should not have any idea what is happening under it.

data.title: Destroyers unable to do damage under fog of war
data.body:
Here is a video. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LGCuNfjkBpc

here is the replay watch with newest release 2015-04-24 - Time in replay 19:19
http://s000.tinyupload.com/?file_id=16775446299068524813

data.title: Fix OpenRA.Game.exe.config being removed by 'make clean'
data.body: Follow up of #8232.

data.title: Remove region assumptions from fast shroud tests
data.body:
The next step towards heightmap-aware shroud and scripted map bound changes.  This removes the region tests by making _all_ cases use the fast path.

This is possible because of two changes:
1. Coordinates are pre-filtered to ensure they are inside the map area (note: this includes the cordon outside the current map bounds).
2. When updating the current visibility any cells outside the current bounds are forced to be hidden.

data.title: Fixed an ArgumentException in ClosestProc
data.body: This intends to fix #8467.

data.title: Change DropDownButtonWidget separator to an image
data.body: Closes #4123.

data.title: Fixed a NullReferenceException in SanitizedPlayerName
data.body: Introduced just recently by myself in https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/8449. Detected by Coverity.

data.title: Fixed NullReferenceExceptions in UpgradeActorRules
data.body: Discovered by the latest Coverity Scan.

data.title: Fixed Sprite.Measure returning a 0 height
data.body: Fixes #8459, a regression introduced by https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/8457.

data.title: Replace Get with GetOrNull in MapEditorLogic.
data.body: Also remove some using directives.

data.title: Crash in the harvester logic
data.body:
Happened while testing soviet-05 (see also #8446).

```
Red Alert Mod at Version {DEV_VERSION}
Operating System: Windows (Microsoft Windows NT 6.2.9200.0)
Runtime Version: .NET CLR 4.0.30319.34209

data.title: Intermittent freezing in AI matches with >6 players
data.body:
![open-ra_1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/12862476/8133435/e89aedd2-115a-11e5-9400-a154fe89b588.jpg)

I have game slowdowns on maps with more than 4 players, but the problem is more prevalent with 6 or more in a map. Every 1-2 seconds the game will freeze for about 1-1.5 seconds before unfreezing, after which it freezes again and the process repeats itself.

I'm running a HP Pavilion g4 laptop, with a Intel Core i5-3210M CPU, 4GBs of RAM, and a Radeon HD 7670M with integrated Intel HD Graphics 4000 as my graphics card.

Please do advise, thank you.

data.title: Adds a feature to Utility that extracts chat content from replay files.
data.body: This is still work in progress and not finished. I opened this PR to get some feedback.

data.title: Dehardcode the chrome palette from icons
data.body:
Adds an IconPalette property to Buildable and SupportPower traits. 

Implements #8434.
Related to #3309.

data.title: Cell selection on diamond (iso) perspective broken again
data.body: Horizontal axis is fine, but vertically it is off by a half cell. Moving the cursor on the lower half of a cell selects the cell below (easy to see when using the terrain geometry debug overlay in TS).

data.title: Crash when loading the serverlist
data.body:
Hello,
I got a problem with OpenRA. I can't refresh the server list, because the game will crash when I refresh the server browser.

Here is the exception.log:

```
Red Alert Mod at Version release-20150424
Operating System: Windows (Microsoft Windows NT 6.1.7601 Service Pack 1)
Runtime Version: .NET CLR 4.0.30319.34209

data.title: Parachuters are killable by placing a building under them
data.body:
Hi guys, this would probably also work with another actors under the parachuters. Basically, for some time before landing and after their jump from the plane you can still place buildings under them. On the screen you can see a squashed troop near the soviet barracks flag.

![bez nazvu](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/12610736/8079902/1adf206e-0f68-11e5-866d-4f9c0e870b6b.png)

data.title: Fixed a common NullReferenceException at SpriteFont.Measure
data.body:
This is a common pitfall so I decided to fix this once and for all at the source of the problem.

Fixes #6743.
Fixes #6813.

data.title: Ingame keyboard shortcuts are broken
data.body:
- Player sidebar has the same shortcuts for all top buttons except diplomacy. They all show Esc. When Esc is pressed, options menu opens.
- In observer sidebar, pressing Esc switches shroud selector to "All Players" view and doesn't open options menu.
- In map editor, pressing Esc changes zoom levels and doesn't open options menu.

data.title: Remove old dependencies from Makefile.
data.body: Followup of https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/8101.

data.title: Random connection problems on dedicated servers
data.body:
Hello,
I got a annoying Problem with my dedicated Server.
My problem is that nobody can connect to the server, if there is only 1 player slot available.
For example if I have a 2 player map and there is 1 player in the lobby nobody is able to connect to the server.
If I have a 8 player map and there are 7 players in the lobby is nobody able to connect to the server.
So the last slot can't be filled.

data.title: fix mapping errors in shipped maps
data.body:
this fixes mapping errors in:
- chokepoint (TD) (temperat trees in desert scenario)
- haos ridges (TD)
- the hot box (TD) (temperat trees in desert scenario)
- instant karma (TD) (temperat trees in desert scenario)
- into the river below (TD) (also some cosmetic changes to the lake)
- intervention (RA)

I've marked the problematic areas:
- http://imgur.com/a/9fpx3 (TD)
- http://imgur.com/LlZXZAb (RA)

edit: I can provide "after" screenshots if needed

Closes https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/7973

data.title: ingame editor: use full screen height for tile window
data.body:
currently the ingame editor window only uses a small area of the available screen estate, and requires the user to scroll through the list to find a tile

editing would be easier if the tile window stretched all the way down to the bottom of the screen, or if the window auto-resized for tabs where there are only few options (e.g. 'overlays')

![editor](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/10729559/8067003/2965e726-0eeb-11e5-95b1-11ca2d86d5ae.png)

data.title: Add option to disable naval yard/sub pen in lobby.
data.body: So I can play on more maps without it quickly divulging into spam subs/ships ASAP and gg.
